website_summaries.verdict: A decent quality printer paper that is easily a go-to favorite for everyday printing needs. A close contender to our pick for the best.
pros: Features the brand's ColorLok technology that prevents ink from smudging or feathering
Works best with inkjet printers, but is compatible with some laser models as well
Comes in packages of single or multiple reams
cons: Some pages came out of the reams wrinkled
A few consumers gripe that it's not as bright white as expected

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS MORE THAN JUST PAPER - IT IS SUPER PAPER
customer_reviews.text: Yes I know I know its just paper, well this is not just paper, it is SUPER PAPER. So I was looking to buy 1 ream of paper a month on one of those recurring deliveries. I had a subscription in the past but they ran out so I hooked this one up..I have to admit the paper is STRONG and THICK,,,so THICK in fact you can feel it in your hands. Really really nice paper get it....Seriously dont you hate that paper that you can almost see thru it makes no sense for a few pennies more you get SUPER PAPER
customer_reviews.author: Emilio

customer_reviews.title: Entire shipment arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I would return this shipment, but frankly it's too much trouble. It included 5 reams of computer paper and weighs a ton. The box the paper arrived in was too big for the 5 reams. The reams must have been jolted back and forth during shipment. The wrapper around every ream of paper was split open. It looked like someone had done it with a knife. One ream of paper had spilled and spread all over the interior of the shipment box.
customer_reviews.author: Careful Consumer

customer_reviews.title: nicer than standard paper for sketching and printing
customer_reviews.text: I always purchase a heavier weight and brightness than the standard printer paper (20lb) for my sketching and rough line drawings. It's been a while since I purchased a new brand and this feels not quite as "nice" as the last ones I purchased, but it has been awhile as a pack of 500 sheets does last me when I'm not also using it for printing. It will definitely serve the purpose for everyday use, and I have no doubts it will be sharp for printing. If you want to step up your resume or presentation/ handout game, definitely try nicer paper!!! People notice.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Printer Paper.
customer_reviews.text: I am a family genealogist. This is perfect for creating a paper trace of my information from various sources. IT serves my needs quite well. I had a hard disk failure several years ago, I had to learn to make a paper trail in case it was to happen again. I have (had) a program of information on this hard disk but the supplier changed the format in 2015 and I can no longer access it. We have a friend that we intend to contact when the weather is cooler to see if he can help create another format for me.
customer_reviews.author: Aldena

customer_reviews.title: Happy With the Quality of this Printer Paper
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this printer paper is high enough to make me happy. It delivers. As advertised, it is bright and the paper thickness is just right and not too thick. One might call it substantial. Printing and graphics in black and in colors look great on this paper. I haven't used it much for photos, so one might look for a different type of paper--perhaps semi-glossy--for that type of printing. Still, it does the job. I've been quite happy with the results, and everything prints great. My HP 8710 ink jet printer has no problem with this paper! Also the price is reasonable I am a repeat buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged paper in open package
customer_reviews.text: Received slightly damaged paper in open package. Not sure if it was damaged during shipment or originally was in this shape. Now with longer delivery times I will have to live with it. And throw away a part of it.
customer_reviews.author: Vitaly K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Printing Training Manuals
customer_reviews.text: I print pages that have both pictures and illustrations. I was using the typical copy paper, but I did not like the quality during the printing process. Especially as these manuals go to people who are paying for a class. I am very happy with this purchase. The 24lb paper is bright and really makes a difference when you are printing documents with text, pictures and illustrations. The result is a non-smudge, clear print and a smooth texture.
customer_reviews.author: ThoseBesideUsTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Paper quality was good but 3 corners of the ream were damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Paper quality was good. 3 corners of the ream were damaged. As such, papers often get caught in printer and it's embarrassing to present papers with crinkled corners. It can't be used for important presentation which is the reason I purchased 24 lb paper instead of the normal 20 lb paper. Very disappointed. Instead of throwing the ream in a big box, please put packaging material to protect the ream of paper.
customer_reviews.author: home fitness girl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product when slightly higher paper quality is needed
customer_reviews.text: I use this paper on my home office Epson Artisan printer. I was having a terrible time with low quality printer paper feeding through my printer without jamming. Low quality paper apparently produces too much dust and clogs things up. Plus the individual sheets tend to stick together when feeding through a home printer. This paper is much smoother and sturdier than cheaper papers, and accepts ink for readily without bleeding. It is not intended to be presentation paper quality, which would obviously be higher priced, and it certainly is not good for printing quality photos. However, from now on I will only use this paper for my home office and avoid the cheaper stock.
customer_reviews.author: Bob T.

customer_reviews.title: Packaging damage & paper not bright
customer_reviews.text: My intention was to pay a little more to get a brighter white paper. It was actually dimmer than the much cheaper paper I had been using. Also, I was disappointed that the ream came in a box (too large for the ream) with a deflated packaging air bag, which explained the crumpled corners on a good portion of the ream. The best thing about this paper was its weight.
customer_reviews.author: LearningMum

customer_reviews.title: did not suit me.
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy a paper from Staples for the printer. But this time the Staples was closed and I had to select the paper on the Amazon. I tried to find the brand that I usually bought in Staples, but amazon does not sell this company. I tried to choose something similar. Not what I want. Unpleasant paper color. It is dense but wrinkles too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Viacheslav N.

customer_reviews.title: The Grey Poupon of Paper
customer_reviews.text: With printer ink retailing at around $5000.00 per gallon, why would anyone print on cheap paper? Beats me. I cannot stand thin, dull printer paper and neither should you. When I am printing my work or trying to send a message, I want paper that matches the quality of my efforts and thoughts. HP Bright White Ink Jet paper fills that need. A paper that is heavy weight, blinding white, and smudge free. You can see and feel the difference.
customer_reviews.author: WAHJR

customer_reviews.title: Good price for quality paper.
customer_reviews.text: Great price I'm on PC all day I keep journals of my granddaughter since she was born. I print the written word & add pictures to represent each day of her visit with me. Christmas was especially busy time for printing & I get photo paper for the pictures to finish off what I wrote about. I make birthday cards printed on the paper as I add in clip art pictures & email to friends. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: KK🌺

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: When was the last time you bought a 2" by 4" that was actually two inches by four inches? Hewlett Packard apparently sells paper the same way. I ordered three reams to test it. This paper is nowhere near as heavy or as bright as the Xerox and Kodak papers I previously used but can no longer find. Colors were very muted and not as bright as the Xerox paper I was using. Very disappointing. I was also very disappointed with Hammermill. Guess I'll have to keep looking for a brand that still delivers quality.
customer_reviews.author: FilmFan

customer_reviews.title: Best printer paper ever
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of coloring, if the coloring book I am using has rough paper I print the page on this paper and find it smoother than regular computer paper. I love it, who knew you could love paper?
customer_reviews.author: NancyBB

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the item I received
customer_reviews.text: The box looked like it was run over by a car. The paper was ripped open inside.
customer_reviews.author: ahmad

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite papers!
customer_reviews.text: One of my two favorite printer papers to use for printing my adult coloring pages and Bible journaling pages on! Is super bright and the ink lays beautifully on it. It also holds pen ink well without much bleed through, and colored pencil lays down on it well, as down some markers and paints and stamping inks.
customer_reviews.author: Christina S.

customer_reviews.title: Love the paper don’t like the shape it’s in when it gets to its destination
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like that the package was ripped open. Corners of the paper bent. I have worked for years in a reprograpgics shop and bent corners do Not go through the printers well and it looks sloppy as well. Hope this can be fixed. Love the paper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for bulk print jobs!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because the cheaper paper I was using (it’s the blue HP paper) curled significantly after printing. It was a huge pain to line up the pages to hole punch or staple. And the physical footprint of a stack of pages was very bloated. This paper lines up easily and doesn’t curl like the other paper. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: TheCatGuy

customer_reviews.title: If you're going to kill a tree to make paper, this paper is the best
customer_reviews.text: I hate using paper, it's outdated but still a necessary evil. If you're a tree hugger like me, this paper is for you. Bright, clean, and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Really good, very bright Ink jet printer paper
customer_reviews.text: The 100% brightness and texture makes it great as it uses less ink from your ink jet printer. The brightness of 100% makes even prints with pics on it show up really nice and detailed. Plus there are way less jams using this paper also. Nice smooth, less porous so it will use less of your ink printing with it.
customer_reviews.author: THXkid

customer_reviews.title: Jam Central
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality prints however unless the paper is separated first before putting in tray it will pull 5 or 10 sheets as 1 then Jamm big time
customer_reviews.author: Jim B.

customer_reviews.title: heavy weight, very bright white
customer_reviews.text: Price okay, specific for inkjets, works great in a laser printer, 24 lb. is pretty substantial; makes it great for more formal presentation, I'd use a cheaper less weighty paper for everyday printing and drafts, 97 is very bright white in color.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Baker

customer_reviews.title: The perfect all-around inkjet printer paper.
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, I LOVE this paper. FIrst, it is nice and thick and works very well with ink jet printers without any bleed through or feeling wet after a large graphic is printed. Far too many papers these days are thinner and (to me) feel cheap by comparison. This is helped even more by the fact that this paper is substantially whiter than most papers, giving both images and text more "pop" and better visibility. If you're only going to print coupons or something, feel free to get a cheaper paper, but if it's anything you may want to keep, I can't recommend this paper more highly.
customer_reviews.author: ZTT Fan

customer_reviews.title: Top quality paper
customer_reviews.text: I like a paper that feels good in the hand. This paper is not flimsy, It is bright and works well. If you are buying a diamond you should take a piece of this with you to put the diamond on. Amazing how that helps you tell the color of a diamond.
customer_reviews.author: homer cook

customer_reviews.title: 24 oz paper saved my Samsung Printer!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Samsung printer. I thought the printer was a dud. During a constant report, 20 oz paper jammed every 8 to 12 pages. Switched to 32 oz. All worked great, pricey, 24 oz paper works great, cost less than 32oz, yet more than then the 20 oz end-of-aisle bargains.
customer_reviews.author: GMAN

customer_reviews.title: MORE PAPER JAMS; not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Since I have an HP printer, I bought this HP paper. Bad idea. I don’t know what it is about this paper but it sticks together and causes more paper jams. I am going to stick with the Highland brand paper I bought on amazon. I never have problems with it. Thank god I didn’t buy a huge ream of it!
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my simple printing needs
customer_reviews.text: Economical source for a ream of paper, delivered directly to my front door. No need for me to get in my car and drive 30 miles round trip for it. Worth the couple of extra dollars for the convenience and to save my time, gasoline, and wear & tear on my car. Just means watching my stock of copying paper so I can reorder when I'm starting to run low on paper. Quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: screen-shopper

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite printer paper!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer a heavier weight because much of what I print gets dragged around with me to rehearsals. A heavier weight paper needs fewer reinforcements in my music binders, and the bright white gives me better contrast for reading music in dim lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Maren Hofstad

customer_reviews.title: Great Paper
customer_reviews.text: This paper is a god weight and whiteness. Documents look good and I will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: High Quality with Ink Jet
customer_reviews.text: We've been very pleased with this paper. It's thick and high quality. Color printing comes out vibrant and professional. I use my printer for both home and office. This paper does the job for all applications.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Natale

customer_reviews.title: Good paper!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice printer paper, thicker than other less expensive paper, and has a good feel. Very white. Looks nice and professional. Looks much more expensive than it is. Will be using this for printer paper from now on.
customer_reviews.author: High Hopes

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Amazon should hire more drivers so each one has time to do their job, though.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot figure out why they delivered this to the neighbors twice. Apts A and B are on the left, C and D on the right. Not too complicated. Most of my deliveries have always been right on my doorstep, but 3 in a row in the last 2 days went to the neighbors! New driver? Paper is great though. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Nelson-Herrera

customer_reviews.title: 100 brightness!!! Hard to find! So happy it's available here!
customer_reviews.text: I always buy HP paper, but have never seen 100 brightness in my local stores! Usually buy the 98 brightness, happy to see that 100 brightness is available here for 3$ less than I pay for 98 brightness in the same 24lb weight! Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: J2Squared

customer_reviews.title: Great paper!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this paper! I just wish bigger brand stores had it in stock more often. The brightness is great for our needs and I much prefer 24lb over regular 20lb printing paper.
customer_reviews.author: Chey

customer_reviews.title: smooth and a little thicker than average printer paper
customer_reviews.text: nice, a little heavier and very smooth compared to ordinary printer paper, which is why it's more expensive. If you don't need those qualities, save the money and get the regular stuff.
customer_reviews.author: happyshopping

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: When you want to make your had outs and fliers look bright and clean, regular paper will not give you the look like this hp paper. I can not find any prices on this paper even close to the price they sell it here on amazon. For price this is my go to paper if we are trying to make a statement.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C

customer_reviews.title: This Paper Arrived Nearly Instantly and Does Not Freeze My Cheap Printer
customer_reviews.text: My cheap printer has a tendency to freeze and for paper crumpling in particular. This almost instantly delivered paper is heavy enough to eliminate those annoying problems. It is white, bright, but not glaring and overwhelming. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Observer One

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the Paper I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for my metal detecting club's newsletter. Holds the ink well, faster drying, no bleed-through. Great tactile feel. In the image, the top issue was printed with this HP paper; the lower issue a generic brand. You may be able to see more bleed-through in the lower image. These are printed on a Canon TS6320.
customer_reviews.author: Vaughan Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Bright,  heavy, ink prints well - arrived with dent
customer_reviews.text: Distinctly nicer than standard stock. 24 lb, substantial weight and rigidity. 97 bright - looks pretty. About 25 pages were crumpled in the corner due to inadequate protection in packaging - the corner got dented. Paper is less likely to get jammed up in my printer due to weight. Inkjet printing looks good on it. For me, it is definitely worth paying just a few dollars more to have better paper, and delivered to my home 1. for convenience, and 2. so I don't get caught up in impulse buying at Office Depot. Needs better packaging.
customer_reviews.author: QuinnTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Jammed my machine immediately.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this paper was not of the “silky” finish that my printer/fax requires. It jammed the machine on the first page. Abd the second try. And third. Luckily, the children down the block made good use of it for their Art.
customer_reviews.author: mayalaya

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Paper
customer_reviews.text: I like this paper. I've have recently been asked to create and make flyers and programs for my church and this item provided a nice finished product that my church is happy with. I originally used standard paper but this paper has a slightly heavier weight to it and the images print better.
customer_reviews.author: C Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good Paper for Ink Jet Photos
customer_reviews.text: Is among the better paper for an inkjet printer printing color photographs on plain paper. I have used it for years. Price was OK on Amazon, probably could equal it with discount coupons at some of the big box stores like Office Depot. But finding it and dealing with the "store" is a pain sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey D Boozer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Paper
customer_reviews.text: Package as delivered, covering was slightly torn, but no damage to paper. Skipped cheaper paper in hopes to obtain quality paper, without issues. I am pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Helped jamming problem with HP printer
customer_reviews.text: Was having a jamming problem using 20Ib weight paper. This paper is 24Ib and HP printer no longer jams. Clear printing,Bright White,, Paper holds ink perfect, would purchase again. Was worried that paper would be bent from shipping but Amazon put it in a box ZERO problem
customer_reviews.author: Terrace L Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: After all of the glowing reviews I was expecting more. This is nice enough paper, but barely better than the run of the mill copy paper you can buy for half the price at your local Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jay

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Paper is used for a Xerox color laser printer with excellent output. Nice weight and brightness of this product. Perfect for routine printer application.
customer_reviews.author: Pistachio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Paper
customer_reviews.text: We have a HP LaserJet Pro printer, and this paper is amazing. We constantly get compliments on it, because it is higher quality than "standard" paper. No jams!! Happy customer - will continue to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: FL

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great thicker writing / printer paper. If you don’t have to print a lot (as this adds up in price), I prefer this paper. Vibrant/ bright white, more professional
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn F.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality paper! This is the thickness for 8 pages. Thick and bright. Good heavy weight for daily use (slightly too heavy but good quality).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality
customer_reviews.text: Paper quality is brilliant, paper is thick and super bright. I got a compliment too lol ( went to DMV office for my license and I had copies of my documents and after touching the paper the officer was like " woww this is some super quality paper" )
customer_reviews.author: Dr.A

customer_reviews.title: Right weight - right white
customer_reviews.text: Even for shopping lists and recipes I like heavier bright white paper. There is a clear difference in print quality between 20 lb and 24 lb paper.
customer_reviews.author: Eyeconic

customer_reviews.title: Great! Will keep buying as needed
customer_reviews.text: Ran out of paper and picked a random brand, very happy that this turned out to be a good buy. The paper is bright and good quality. I have no complaints and would consider buying this again as needed. All I do is some light home use printing that includes coupons.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: NO PAPER JAMS
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this 24lb paper because you have almost no paper jams. I've only had one in 20 years since using this weight paper across three printers. I do frequent mailings and print off shipping labels. This saves headaches since it's a matter of keeping things rolling and timeliness. I used to order from HP but with one click just easier with AMAZON. Also like the feel of the thickness and bright white is great for appearance and readability.
customer_reviews.author: Fleurette Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Ream of paper smashed at the corner
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the paper is very good. It is much better than regular printer papers. You can feel the difference right away in your hands. Only problem is that it came smashed at the corner. A third of the sheets are not useable. The ink will smear at that corner and the printer may jam.
customer_reviews.author: Gary lai

customer_reviews.title: Very nice printer paper
customer_reviews.text: The paper I was using before I had gotten at Walgreens was just flat out cheap. You can literally feel the quality of this paper, not to thick but not to fragile. I never thought you'd actually feel the difference in printer paper, but this stuff is great!
customer_reviews.author: Brett Faes

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: HP is always good brand of products. This is no exception. No matter what you print, this paper will make it look professional.
customer_reviews.author: Nana S

customer_reviews.title: What can I say?  Its Paper!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously though, this product has a definite solid feel compared to good old copy paper or cheap inject paper that most people use. It is thicker and doesn't bleed when it gets a little bit wet or smudge when you touch it. You could do worse than this for sure if you wanted to print awards certificates. Its not the heaviest stock available but in a frame no one would know for sure. The Bright White absolutely stands out when compared to other paper. I have been using this since my first days of inject printers when it ran or smudged when you touched it.
customer_reviews.author: David PAmazonTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: It's paper for sure!
customer_reviews.text: It's bright white paper and the ink stands out nicely on it. So it does what printer paper is supposed to, don't really know what else can be said about paper?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: REALLY GOD Quality PAPER FOR THE $
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS GREAT QUALITY PAPER FOR THE PRICE IT DOSENT FELL CHEAP OR TO THIN it's GREAT PRINTING PAPER WITH VIBRANT COLORS WHEN YOU ARE USING COLOR IN YOUR PRINTS AOP3D.COM HIGHLY RECOMMENDS!!!! AOP3D.COM HELPING OTHERS WITH THERE PURCHASE ONE REVIEW AT A TIME :)
customer_reviews.author: AOP3D

customer_reviews.title: came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a bulk order of this paper and received 8 of them. All 8 that came were damaged and had clearly been opened, used, and then taped closed. A lot of the sheets of paper inside were dirty, damaged, folded, etc. We will not be buying this brand in the future and advise people who do to be aware and careful when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: sara gossett

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bright paper
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful good quality paper. This paper makes what you print so much better looking. Putting it side by side with your average paper makes the purchase worth it. Price is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: The greatest!
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find an acceptable printer paper for an HP1022 Laserjet because most papers I have tried have a problem with heat curling when printing large documents. The heat curl sometimes destroys the printer's ability to print the 2nd side of a 2 sided document if quite a few pages are being printed. Received this paper today and immediately put it into my printer and tested it and it passed with flying colors. A big plus is that not only was the cost of the paper extremely affordable but it came in just a couple of days with prepaid shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Old Codger

customer_reviews.title: Nah. Not All Paper Is Paper!
customer_reviews.text: Along with purchasing some ink cartridges for my BROTHER Printer, I decided to get some paper for some documents I quickly needed. I chose this HP paper on an immediate lark. And I'm glad I did. It gave practically laser-quality results. Totally impressed.
customer_reviews.author: LLNYRN

customer_reviews.title: not that bright of a white
customer_reviews.text: I compared this to another brand with same brightness & weight and it did look duller, will be looking for better priced bright white
customer_reviews.author: Bostongal

customer_reviews.title: Don't usually like this white of paper but it is very nice actually
customer_reviews.text: Usually my eyes dislike looking at paper this white, but I find this one to be perfect. Very white, but not discomforting to read on for long periods of time. It is also very nice to take notes/write on because of how soft it is. It is also a relatively thick paper - often mistake one page for being multiple pages.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I love nice paper! I do a lot of graphic work, and quality is important. This is my “go to” paper for anything not requiring card stock or heavier, and it’s a great choice for everything from letters to flyers.
customer_reviews.author: Bev Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Have HP printer - use HP paper
customer_reviews.text: I consistently use HP paper in my HP printer. I have never had an issue with jamming or print smearing or anything. I particularly like the heavier weight and brighter style. I recommend this multi-purpose paper highly.
customer_reviews.author: cctyger

customer_reviews.title: Just WoW!!
customer_reviews.text: This photo of my daughter and grandson looks like a professional quality print. I literally own a $40 HP printer and I am astounded. I used regular old $5 paper before, and the difference is wonderful. Glad I found it!
customer_reviews.author: Erzulie KingsLee

customer_reviews.title: Delivered to your door step in days.
customer_reviews.text: Great product shipped fast to your door step. Why go out when you can have paper delivered to your door step???
customer_reviews.author: Nathan F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Paper
customer_reviews.text: Although this is HP it works great on Epson printers. Great quality prints for all kinds of printing projects.
customer_reviews.author: Rockon

customer_reviews.title: DOGEARED PAPER CORNERS CAN JAM A PRINTER
customer_reviews.text: This is the second shipment I received with "dogeared" bent paper corners that can jam my printer...like the ream was dropped on its corner and bent the paper. Or the 500 page ream was assembled with some bent corner sheets. I load my printer so the bent corners do not enter first' Otherwise, this is great inkjet paper. SUGGESTION: Improve shipment packaging and handling so corners of these heavy weight reams are protected!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy stock paper
customer_reviews.text: My go to paper for all print jobs. I have a Canon printer that doesn’t appreciate cheap light stock paper. This is a heavy stock paper and I never have paper jams.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels nicer than your average paper
customer_reviews.text: Compared this to my old paper that I had bought at the drug store and WOW. It is such nice quality and very bright white. Feels soft and looks very good with printing.
customer_reviews.author: Kaley Martin

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best paper to display your labors.
customer_reviews.text: I produce about 30 professional reports every year that typically run to about 70 pages each, and then print about 10 copies of each report for my clients. That's over 20,000 pages printed annually. I want every page to be perfect and durable, and HP Bright White is the only paper that I use for my work products. The paper feeds well, reproduces my text and photos and maps in all of their glory, endures comb binding without tearing, and withstands a lot of end-use by my clients. I hope that they keep producing this valuable medium!
customer_reviews.author: A. M. White

customer_reviews.title: My paper of choice for my HP Envy printer
customer_reviews.text: Very white, heavy paper for high-quality color and B&W printing - that about sums it up!
customer_reviews.author: HokieFan

customer_reviews.title: Not bright white
customer_reviews.text: This paper has a detectable greyish hue. It is not disturbing when looked at on its own, but clearly visible next to bright white sheets. Besides that, upon removing the plastic wrap, it turned out that roughly 20% of the sheets were badly wrinkled around the corner. It has nothing to do with the manufacturing but rendered a good chunk of the package useless.
customer_reviews.author: GZL

customer_reviews.title: Great Texture to the paper
customer_reviews.text: Feels great in your hands and holds up well. Not that plastic feeling paper you get in some cases. Prints great.
customer_reviews.author: Taz&MrsTaz

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: I don't print enough to warrant buying a case of paper. Buying one ream of paper makes sense for me. The weight of the paper is better than I expected. AND GUESS WHAT?...It was delivered to my door!!!
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, Bright White Paper
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality paper at a good price. Delivered right to my door? YES, please! No more buying lesser quality at Walmart or the insanely expensive stuff at office stores. Highly recommend. This will be my go-to paper from now on.

customer_reviews.title: dependable

customer_reviews.title: Great reliable paper

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This printing paper is bomb. It has just the right amount of thickness and does not feel or look cheap. I use this paper with my HP Envy 5052 printer and I just love it. I will definitively stock up on this item

customer_reviews.title: Great product for your money

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality paper. Not as thick as the reviews make them seem.
customer_reviews.text: This is decently sturdy quality clean white paper. It gets the job done. It's not cheap quality. It's not super thick like some people have been reviewing.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality paper..
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the purchase... definitely better decision to go with 24lb paper.. paper feels really good.. got it to use with HP laser jet printer...
customer_reviews.author: Azeem

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: It boggles my mind that I can order first class paper for a price, including delivery, that is cheaper than I'd pay at the local big box office supply store. How do you do that? If prices stay this good, I'll be buying this and other paper products through Amazon in the future. Granted, it can take a bit of work searching through all the options available to find exactly what one wants at the best price. But yes, it is better than driving to Office Depot or Staples. Well done Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Grindahl

customer_reviews.title: Best paper in the market.  Been buying for years
customer_reviews.text: No point u. Trying any other paper. It is simply the best available

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap printer paper

customer_reviews.title: Great paper that is a step above

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous printing!

product_meta.title: HP Printer Paper 8.5x11 BrightWhite 24 lb 1 Ream 500 Sheets 100 Bright Made in USA FSC Certified Copy Paper HP Compatible 203000R
product_meta.description: Size:1 Ream| style name:8.5x11HP Papers is a premium line of uncoated printing paper optimized to provide superior print paper performance when used with HP hardware and supplies and in all other makes and models of printing and copying equipment. Launched in 1996, HP Papers are manufactured and marketed exclusively worldwide in over 75 countries by International Paper, a globally recognized leader in paper products, under license from the Hewlett-Packard Company. With a diverse range of products designed to support a wide range of print applications, from everyday copies to full-color presentations, you can be assured of consistent, high-quality print performance every time. HP BrightWhite24 Paper is a 24 lb, super smooth paper that is extra bright (100 bright) and whiter (165 whiteness) than ordinary paper. HP BrightWhite24 empowers inkjet printers to produce their boldest, richest colors. Engineered with ColorLok Technology BrightWhite24 paper provides brighter colors and bolder blacks for great-looking reports, school work and professional business documents. HP BrightWhite24 is available in 8.5 x 11 letter size paper optimized for full-color printing in all inkjet printers and copiers.
feature_bullets: Made in USA - HP Papers is sourced from renewable forest resources and has achieved production with 0% deforestation in North America. See images
Optimized for HP technology - All HP Papers provide premium performance on HP equipment, as well as on all other printer and copier equipment. 100% satisfaction guaranteed. See images.

An extra bright, white paper when you need to print full-color documents - HP Bright White24 is thicker (24 pounds), brighter (100 bright) and whiter (165 whiteness) than ordinary printing papers and is optimized for full-color printing in all inkjet printers and copies.

Certified sustainable - HP BrightWhite24 printer paper is Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) certified and contributes toward satisfying credit MR1 under LEED (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design). See images.
Colorlok technology printing paper - Colorlok technology provides more vivid colors, bolder blacks and faster drying. See images.
Acid free paper – HP BrightWhite24 print and copy paper prevents yellowing over time to ensure a long-lasting appearance for added archival quality.
